name: Gas Spore
condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, prone

traits.Death Burst: The gas spore explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15+1d4 + 13 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the poisoned condition are immune to this disease.
traits.Eerie Resemblance: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15+1d4 + 13 Intelligence (Nature) check.
